hanzi-su-wiki:
伍

Значения

Ряд, шеренга; цифра пять (в документах)

Мнемоника

Минимальная воинская единица — «пяток» 五 солдат 亻.

squad of five soldiers; to associate with; five (banker's anti-fraud numeral)

purpleculture_examples:
入伍 [ rù wǔ ]: to enter the army; to enlist
退伍 [ tuì wǔ ]: to be discharged from military service
落伍 [ luò wǔ ]: to fall behind the ranks; to be outdated
为伍 [ wéi wǔ ]: to associate with; to keep company with
配伍 [ pèi wǔ ]: to blend two or more medicines; compatibility (of herbal remedies, medicines)

Ru_trainchinese:
wǔ: (число) пять (используется при заполнении документов и чеков)
wǔ: (графема) древняя воинская единица из пяти человек; компания; У (фамилия)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: five (五) men (亻) = five
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Mr. T knows that the Roman Numeral for five is V.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " person " to " five ", the original meaning is the ancient army establishment unit, and five soldiers are organized into one corps. "Shuowen": "Meeting in the army. From the people to the five." "Zhou Li‧Xiaguan‧Zhou Zi": "Together with his soldiers, to have his own division." Zheng Xuan's note: "A hundred soldiers in military law are soldiers, and five members are soldiers. ."

" Wu " also refers to the establishment of the ancient private households, and five families are organized into one. "The Thirty Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Xianggong": "Tian You Fengxiu, Lu Jing You Wu." Du's note: "Ensure the five families to protect each other."

" Wu " also means that the unit of the ancient military vehicle was composed of one hundred and twenty-five multipliers or one hundred and twenty multipliers. "Zhou Li‧ Xia Guan‧ Si You": "We fit in with the soldiers of the car, but are better than the ride." Jia Gongyan quoted Sima Fa and said: "Take a hundred and twenty-five rides."

" Wu " also refers to queues and ranks. "Mencius·Gongsun Chouxia": "A man who holds a halberd in one day loses his army three times. Will he go?" Zhao Qi's note: "One day loses his army three times."

" Wu " also refers to the army in general. Liu Yuxi of the Tang Dynasty "The Collected Works of Wei Gong, the Servant of the Book of the Tang Dynasty": "The public is in the middle of the army, and he was born as the governor of Kaizhou."

" Wu " can refer to soldiers. Song Yuefei, "Going to Qiu to go deep into Shaanluo, but there was a hungry escape in the village, so the minister hurriedly paid back and failed."

" Wu " also refers to associates and companions. "Historical Records: The Biography of the Marquis of Huaiyin": "When the letter goes out, he smiles and says: "Sheng Nai and Kuai etc. are in the company.""

" Wu " also said that they are accomplices and are in the same row. Song Wang Anshi (Han Xin): "At that time, I was waiting for He Youwu, but there was an evil young man in Huaiyin."
humanum_short_description_en: From " person " to " five ", the original meaning is the ancient army organization unit, five soldiers are organized into one corps.
humanum_full_description:
從「人」，從「五」，本義為古代軍隊編制單位，士兵五名編為一伍。《說文》：「相參伍也。从人从五。」 《周禮‧夏官‧諸子》：「合其卒伍，置其有司。」鄭玄注：「軍法百人為卒，五人為伍。」

　　「伍」也表示古代民戶編制單位，五家編為一伍。《左傳‧襄公三十年》：「田有封洫，盧井有伍。」杜預注：「使五家相保。」

　　「伍」還表示古代兵車單位，以一百二十五乘為伍，或以一百二十乘為伍。《周禮‧夏官‧司右》：「合其車之卒伍，而比其乘。」賈公彥疏引司馬法曰：「以百二十五乘為伍。」

　　「伍」亦指隊列、行列。《孟子‧公孫丑下》：「子之持戟之士，一日而三失伍，則去之否乎？」趙岐注：「一日三失其行伍。」

　　「伍」也泛指軍隊。唐劉禹錫〈唐故中書侍郎平章事韋公集〉：「公在伍中，出為開州刺史。」

　　「伍」可指士兵。宋岳飛〈乞出師札〉：「去秋臣兵深入陝洛，而在寨卒伍有飢餓閃走，故臣急還，不遂前功。」

　　「伍」也指同伙、同伴。《史記‧淮陰侯列傳》：「信出門，笑曰：『生乃與噲等為伍。』」

　　「伍」還表示結為同伙、排為同列。宋王安石〈韓信〉：「當時噲等何由伍，但有淮陰惡少年。」
humanum_short_description: 從「人」，從「五」，本義為古代軍隊編制單位，士兵五名編為一伍。

從「 人 」，從「 五 」，本義為古代軍隊編制單位，士兵五名編為一伍。《說文》：「相參伍也。从人从五。」 《周禮‧夏官‧諸子》：「合其卒伍，置其有司。」鄭玄注：「軍法百人為卒，五人為伍。」 「 伍 」也表示古代民戶編制單位，五家編為一伍。《左傳‧襄公三十年》：「田有封洫，盧井有伍。」杜預注：「使五家相保。」 「 伍 」還表示古代兵車單位，以一百二十五乘為伍，或以一百二十乘為伍。《周禮‧夏官‧司右》：「合其車之卒伍，而比其乘。」賈公彥疏引司馬法曰：「以百二十五乘為伍。」 「 伍 」亦指隊列、行列。《孟子‧公孫丑下》：「子之持戟之士，一日而三失伍，則去之否乎？」趙岐注：「一日三失其行伍。」 「 伍 」也泛指軍隊。唐劉禹錫〈唐故中書侍郎平章事韋公集〉：「公在伍中，出為開州刺史。」 「 伍 」可指士兵。宋岳飛〈乞出師札〉：「去秋臣兵深入陝洛，而在寨卒伍有飢餓閃走，故臣急還，不遂前功。」 「 伍 」也指同伙、同伴。《史記‧淮陰侯列傳》：「信出門，笑曰：『生乃與噲等為伍。』」 「 伍 」還表示結為同伙、排為同列。宋王安石〈韓信〉：「當時噲等何由伍，但有淮陰惡少年。」
From " person" to " five", the original meaning is the ancient army establishment unit, and five soldiers are organized into one corps. "Shuowen": "Meeting in the army. From the people to the five." "Zhou Li‧Xiaguan‧Zhou Zi": "Together with his soldiers, to have his own division." Zheng Xuan's note: "A hundred soldiers in military law are soldiers, and five members are soldiers. ." " Wu" also refers to the establishment of the ancient private households, and five families are organized into one. "The Thirty Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Xianggong": "Tian You Fengxiu, Lu Jing You Wu." Du's note: "Ensure the five families to protect each other." " Wu" also means that the unit of the ancient military vehicle was composed of one hundred and twenty-five multipliers or one hundred and twenty multipliers. "Zhou Li‧ Xia Guan‧ Si You": "We fit in with the soldiers of the car, but are better than the ride." Jia Gongyan quoted Sima Fa and said: "Take a hundred and twenty-five rides." " Wu" also refers to queues and ranks. "Mencius·Gongsun Chouxia": "A man who holds a halberd in one day loses his army three times. Will he go?" Zhao Qi's note: "One day loses his army three times." " Wu" also refers to the army in general. Liu Yuxi of the Tang Dynasty "The Collected Works of Wei Gong, the Servant of the Book of the Tang Dynasty": "The public is in the middle of the army, and he was born as the governor of Kaizhou." " Wu" can refer to soldiers. Song Yuefei, "Going to Qiu to go deep into Shaanluo, but there was a hungry escape in the village, so the minister hurriedly paid back and failed." " Wu" also refers to associates and companions. "Historical Records: The Biography of the Marquis of Huaiyin": "When the letter goes out, he smiles and says: "Sheng Nai and Kuai etc. are in the company."" " Wu" also said that they are accomplices and are in the same row. Song Wang Anshi (Han Xin): "At that time, I was waiting for He Youwu, but there was an evil young man in Huaiyin."

Name meaning
:1. Refers to the army, which is extended to be mighty and organized; 2. It also refers to the companions, which is extended to complement each other.
wǔ
I числ. /сущ.
1) пять (прописью, см. 五)
伍圆 5 юаней
2) пять человек, пять семейств
3) * пять дворов, связанных круговой порукой
4) пяток солдат; ряд, шеренга; строй
合其卒伍 присоединиться к пятёрке его солдат
5) ряды бойцов; войска, армия
II собств.
